description: The newly introduced jumplists, which appear when you right-click on an icon in the superbar, help improving the workflow a lot, but if you want combine multiple programs in one icon, you’re screwed.It lets you add up to 60 programs or files within self-defined groups inside a jumplist, but see yourself.
summary: The newly introduced jumplists, which appear when you right-click on an icon in the superbar, help improving the workflow a lot, but if you want combine multiple programs in one icon, you’re screwed.It lets you add up to 60 programs or files within self-defined groups inside a jumplist, but see yourself.
author: Hedgehog
